_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

CommonTransportationReport.description: A common document used for reporting transport related issues to authorities or regulators.

CommonTransportationReport.title: Common Transportation Report. Details
CommonTransportationReport.description: A common document used for reporting transport related issues to authorities or regulators.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Common Transportation Report. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Common Transportation Report. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Common Transportation Report. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Common Transportation Report. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

UUID.title: Common Transportation Report. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Common Transportation Report. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Common Transportation Report. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

DocumentStatusCode.title: Common Transportation Report. Document Status Code. Code
DocumentStatusCode.description: A code signifying the status of this Common Transportation Report with respect to its original state.

ReportTypeCode.title: Common Transportation Report. Report Type Code. Code
ReportTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of report being provided

ReportType.title: Common Transportation Report. Report Type. Text
ReportType.description: A text that identifies the type of report to business users.

Description.title: Common Transportation Report. Description. Text
Description.description: Textual description of this document instance.

Note.title: Common Transportation Report. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

VersionID.title: Common Transportation Report. Version. Identifier
VersionID.description: Identifies a version of a common transportation report in order to distinguish updates.

ReporterParty.title: Common Transportation Report. Reporter_ Party. Party
ReporterParty.description: The party providing this common transportation report.

AuthorityParty.title: Common Transportation Report. Authority_ Party. Party
AuthorityParty.description: The authority or regulator receiving this common transportation report.

SenderParty.title: Common Transportation Report. Sender_ Party. Party

ReceiverParty.title: Common Transportation Report. Receiver_ Party. Party

ReportingLocation.title: Common Transportation Report. Reporting_ Location. Location
ReportingLocation.description: A location to which this common transportation report applies.

Shipment.title: Common Transportation Report. Shipment
Shipment.description: A shipment to which this common transportation report applies.

TransportMeans.title: Common Transportation Report. Transport Means
TransportMeans.description: A means of transport used in relation to this common transportation report.

DocumentReference.title: Common Transportation Report. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to a document relevant for or associated with this common transportation report.

Signature.title: Common Transportation Report. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.
